00028         private void FormCRUD_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00029         {
00030             Proxy.Trip temp = new TripiWCF.ClientMockup.Proxy.Trip();
00031             temp.ID = -1;
00032             temp.Username = Environment.UserName;
00033             temp.TripName = Environment.MachineName;
00034             temp.TripDescription = Environment.CommandLine + "\r\n" + Environment.CurrentDirectory;
00035             propertyGridTrip.SelectedObject = temp;
00036         }

00038         #region Handling buttons
00039         private void buttonConnect_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00040         {
00041             TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient = new TripiWCF.ClientMockup.Proxy.TripServiceClient(comboBoxEndpoint.SelectedItem as string);
00042             //TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient = new TripiWCF.ClientMockup.Proxy.TripServiceClient("TripiAha");
00043             //TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient = new TripiWCF.ClientMockup.Proxy.TripServiceClient("TripiLocalhost");
00044 
00045             buttonCreateAsProphesized.Enabled = true;
00046             buttonCreateRandomNode.Enabled = true;
00047             buttonCreateTrip.Enabled = true;
00048             buttonGetNodes.Enabled = true;
00049             buttonGetTrips.Enabled = true;
00050             buttonUpdateTripDesc.Enabled = true;
00051         }
00052 
00053         private void buttonCreateTrip_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00054         {
00055             Proxy.Trip temp = propertyGridTrip.SelectedObject as Proxy.Trip;
00056             int newTripID = TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient.CreateNewTrip(temp.Username, temp.TripName, temp.TripDescription);
00057             temp.ID = newTripID;
00058             propertyGridTrip.SelectedObject = temp;
00059         }
00060 
00061         private void buttonGetTrips_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00062         {
00063             Proxy.Trip temp = propertyGridTrip.SelectedObject as Proxy.Trip;
00064             listBoxTrips.Items.Clear();
00065             listBoxTrips.Items.AddRange(TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient.GetTripsForUser(temp.Username));
00066         }
00067 
00068         private void buttonGetNodes_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00069         {
00070             Proxy.Trip temp = propertyGridTrip.SelectedObject as Proxy.Trip;
00071             listBoxPositions.Items.Clear();
00072             listBoxPositions.Items.AddRange(TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient.GetPositionNodesForTrip(temp.ID));
00073         }
00074 
00075         private void buttonCreateRandomNode_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00076         {
00077             Proxy.Trip temp = propertyGridTrip.SelectedObject as Proxy.Trip;
00078             Proxy.PositionNode noed = new TripiWCF.ClientMockup.Proxy.PositionNode
00079             {
00080                 CreationTime = DateTime.Now,
00081                 Latitude = Tanarri.NextDouble() * 90 - 45,
00082                 Longitude = Tanarri.NextDouble() * 90 - 45,
00083                 TripID = temp.ID
00084             };
00085             TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient.AddPositionNode(noed);
00086         }
00087 
00088         private void buttonCreateAsProphesized_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00089         {
00090             Proxy.PositionNode noed = propertyGridPosition.SelectedObject as Proxy.PositionNode;
00091             if (noed != null) TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient.AddPositionNode(noed);
00092         }
00093 
00094         private void buttonUpdateTripDesc_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00095         {
00096             Proxy.Trip temp = propertyGridTrip.SelectedObject as Proxy.Trip;
00097             TripiProxyFoxyJazzyClient.UpdateTripDescription(temp.ID, temp.TripDescription);
00098         }
